MORE ABOUT ME  

ABOUT ME

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do.

Hi there, I am a 22 years old Computer Science Engineer 💻 living in Hyderabad, India. I develop web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and its related frameworks. I am currently working at Larsen & Toubro Infotech as a Front End Developer.

Have a look at my skills or check out my portfolio below and feel free to reach out if you'd like to chat or if you feel that I'd be a good fit for your team. I would love to hear from you. Thank you for stopping by! 🙏

PORTFOLIO

I enjoy building web products from scratch and I value scalable code with clean design patterns.

Code Demo
uPost
uPost is a MERN full-stack application, which allows a user to create an account and create posts. The Express app includes a MongoDB database via Mongoose and user authentication via JWT. Posts can also be edited and deleted by the user. The real-time persistent connection is established between client and server using Websocket.
HTML5 CSS3 React Node.js Express.js MongoDB REST Websocket
Code Demo
Recipe Finder
Recipe Finder is a vanilla JavaScript application that interacts with a remote API to fetch and display recipe food data. This app uses modern JavaScript tools, such as Parcel to bundle the modules, and Babel to convert ES6+ back to ES5. The user can search for a specific recipe, and add ingredients to a shopping list or save to a favourites list via local storage.
HTML5 CSS3 SCSS VanillaJS (ES6+)
Code Demo
ShopNonStop
ShopNonStop is a fictional online store built with React, Redux and Firebase. The application is built as a part of learning React and an idea to practice my skills in React, Redux and emerging awareness of Context API and React-Hooks.
HTML5 CSS3 SCSS React Redux Firebase
Code Demo
Pomodoro Clock
This is an app to organize time and increase work productivity using Pomodoro technique, which is a technique with purpose to improve productivity mesured by a timer. Your work time gets splitted into smaller chunks with breaks taken in between. I built this application as part of freeCodeCamp curriculum.
HTML5 CSS3 SCSS React
Code Demo
Calculator
This mini project is a basic calculator built with React that performs simple arithematic calculations. I built this application as part of freeCodeCamp curriculum.
HTML5 CSS3 React
Code Demo
Drum Machine
Drum Machine is a React web application built with React that creates percussion sounds, drum beats, and patterns on key press. I built this application as part of freeCodeCamp curriculum.
HTML5 CSS3 React
Code Demo
Markdown Previewer
Markdown Previewer is a React powered Markdown editor. Type some Markdown on the left. See the result in the right. Magic. I built this application as part of freeCodeCamp curriculum.
HTML5 CSS3 React
Code Demo
Random Quote Machine
Random Quote Machine is a small web application built using React to display random inspirational quotes. I built this application as part of freeCodeCamp curriculum.
HTML5 CSS3 React
